  (let

     b-into-n (goes-into-n b)
     _ (println "b into n" b-into-n)
     ab-into-n (goes-into-n (* a b))
     _ (println "ab into n" ab-into-n)
     sum-from-a (* a (sum-to-x a-into-n))
     _ (println "sum from a" sum-from-a)
     sum-from-b (* b (sum-to-x b-into-n))
     _ (println "sum from b" sum-from-b)
     sum-from-ab (* a b (sum-to-x ab-into-n))
     _ (println "sum from ab" sum-from-ab)]
     (- (+ sum-from-a sum-from-b) sum-from-ab)))

    (- (+ (f a) (f b))

    (+' (*' a (quot (*' qta (inc qta)) 2))
        (*' b (quot (*' qtb (inc qtb)) 2))
        (-' (*' (* a b) (quot (*' qtab (inc qtab)) 2))))))

          (nsum [m x] (* x (sum (quot (dec m) x))))]
    (let [a (bigint a)
          b (bigint b)
          [a b c] (map #(nsum n %) [a b (* a b)])]
     (- (+ a b) c))))

(fn big-divide [n p q]
  (let [
       n (- n 1)
        cal (fn [p]
              (/ (*' (quot n p)
                    (+' p
                       (*' (quot n p)
                          p)))
                 2))
        x (cal p)
        y (cal q)
        z (cal (*' p q))
        ]
    (- (+ x y) z)
   ))

(fn bigdivide 
  [n d1 d2] 
  (letfn 
    [(sumlist2 [n] (/ (*' n (inc n)) 2))
     (sumdiv [d] (*' (sumlist2 (quot (dec n) d)) d))]
    (- (+(sumdiv d1)(sumdiv d2)) (sumdiv (* d1 d2)))))

(fn [f x y] 
  (let[f' (dec f) xq (quot f' x) yq (quot f' y)] 
    (if (= 0 xq yq) 0 
      (letfn[(sum [a d n] (quot (* n (+ (* 2N a) (* (dec n) d))) 2))] 
        (- (+ (sum y y yq) (sum x x xq)) 
          (let[xy (* x y) xyq (quot f' xy)] 
            (sum xy xy xyq)))))))

(fn [n fst scd]
  (let [sum (fn [n d]
              (let [div (bigint (quot (dec n) d))]
                (* d div (inc div) 1/2)))]
    (+ (sum n fst) (sum n scd) (- (sum n (* fst scd))))))

(fn p148-solution [top-n top-a top-b]
  (letfn [(get-largest-multiple [n a]
            (loop [n (dec n)]
              (if (zero? (mod n a))
                n
               (recur (dec n)))))
          (get-multiplier [largest-multiple a]
            (/ largest-multiple a))
          (get-sum-of-ns [n]
            (/ (*' n (inc' n)) 2))
          (get-big-divide [n a]
            (let [largest-multiple (get-largest-multiple n a)
                  multiplier (get-multiplier largest-multiple a)]
              (*' a (get-sum-of-ns multiplier))))]
    (- (+' (get-big-divide top-n top-a)
          (get-big-divide top-n top-b))
       (get-big-divide top-n (* top-a top-b)))))

(fn [n, a, b]
  (letfn [(in [k, n]
              (let [m (bigint (quot n k))]
                (* k (/ (* m (inc m)) 2))))
          (gcd [a, b]
               (loop [a a, b b]
                 (if (= b 0)
                   a
                   (recur b (mod a b)))))
          (lcm [a, b]
               (/ (* a b) (gcd a b)))]
    (let [n1 (dec n)]
      (-
       (+
        (in a n1)
        (in b n1))
       (in (lcm a b) n1)))))

#(let [sum    (fn [n d]    (/ (*' n (+ d (* d n))) 2))
       sum-to (fn [end by] (sum (quot end by) by))
       n      (dec %1)]
   (-
    (+ (sum-to n %2)
       (sum-to n %3))
    (sum-to n (* %2 %3))))
(fn [n a b] (letfn [(f [x] (let [q (bigint (quot (dec n) x))] (/ (* x q (inc q)) 2)))] (- (+ (f a) (f b)) (f (* a b)))))

; later I saw lcm[] is not needed, becasue those numbers are coprimes
(fn big [a b c]
   (let [limit (dec a)]
      (letfn [(sum [n] (let [item (quot limit n)]
                 ( / (*' (+ n (* n item)) item) 2)))
              (lcm [c d]
                 (/ (* c d)
                    ((fn gcd [a b] (if (zero? b) a (gcd b (rem a b)))) c d)))]
        (- (+ (sum b) (sum c))
           (sum (lcm b c))) ; equals this case (sum (* b c))
     )))

(fn __ [n a b]
  (letfn [(find [n divider] (->> n dec bigint (iterate dec) (filter #(zero? (rem % divider))) first))
          (sum [n divider] (let [found (find n divider)]
                			 (/ (* (/ found divider) (+ divider found)) 2)))]
  (- (+ (sum n a) (sum n b)) (sum n (* a b)))))

(fn [n a b]
  (let [ab (* a b)
        up (fn [i]
             (* (quot (dec n) i) i))
        ae (up a)
        be (up b)
        abe (up ab)
        sum (fn [s e]
              (if (> s e)
                0
                (-> (+' s e)
                    (*' (inc (/ (-' e s) s)))
                    (/ 2))))]
    (-' (+' (sum a ae)
            (sum b be))
        (sum ab abe))))

(sum-of-positive-integers-upto [n] (* (/ (+ 1N n) 2) n))

  [n d1 d2]

(fn big-divide [n a b]
  (let [n-big (bigint n)
        get-sup (fn [x] (bigint (let [c (- n-big (mod n-big x))] (if (= c n-big) (- n-big x) c))))
        pa-sum (fn [inf sup n] (-> (+ inf sup) (* n) (/ 2)))
        num-terms (fn [a1 an] (-> (- an a1) (/ a1) (+ 1)))
        calc (fn [inf sup] (pa-sum inf sup (num-terms inf sup)))
        a-sup (get-sup a)
        b-sup (get-sup b)
        ab (* a b)
        ab-sup (get-sup ab)]
    (-> (calc a a-sup) (+ (calc b b-sup)) (- (calc ab ab-sup)))))

       ge (fn [n a] (* n (/ (+ (* 2 a) (* (dec n) a)) 2)))]

(fn [n a b]
  (let [;; Formula n(a_1 + a_n) / 2 for an arithmetic series.
        series (fn [l step]
                 (/ (*' (quot l step)
                       (+ step (- l (rem l step))))
                    2))
        ;; The problem states "under n" so the limit is n-1.
        l (dec n)]
    (- (+ (series l a)
          (series l b))
       ;; Subtract what was counted twice.
       (series l (* a b)))))

(fn [n a b]
  (let [tri #(quot (*' (+' 1 %) %) 2)
        step (* a b) perstep (+ (* a (tri b)) (* b (tri a)) (- 0 step)) understep (* step (+ a b -1))
        steps (quot (dec n) step) start (inc (* step steps))
        before (+ (* perstep steps) (*' understep (tri (dec steps))))
        after (apply + (filter #(or (= (rem % a) 0) (= (rem % b) 0)) (range start n)))]
    (+ before after)))

(fn big-divide [^clojure.lang.BigInt n a b]
  (letfn [(sum-of-divisors [^clojure.lang.BigInt n a]
          (if (> a n) 
            0
            (let [ q (- (quot n a) (if (zero? (rem n a)) 1 0))]
              (if (= q 1)
                a
                (quot (*' q (+' 1 q) a) 2)))))]
  (if (or (> a n) (> b n))
    0
    (bigint (-' (+' (sum-of-divisors n a)
          (sum-of-divisors n b))
       (sum-of-divisors n (* a b)))))))

;; More a maths problem than a programming one
;; Note *' Some other ops may need this really but current version passes tests.
(fn [n a b]
  (letfn [ (triangle [i] 
                     (quot (*' i (+ i 1)) 2))
           (calc-one [i]
                     (*' i (triangle (quot (dec n) i) )))
           ]
    (let [ab (* a b)
          a-tot  (calc-one a)
          b-tot  (calc-one b)
          ab-tot (calc-one ab)
          total  (- (+ a-tot b-tot) ab-tot)
          ]
      total )))

(fn big-divide
  [n a b]
  (letfn [(lin-sum
            [end diff]
            (if (< end diff) 0
                (let [a1 diff
                      n  (quot end diff)
                      an (*' diff n)
                      s (if (= an end) an (+' a1 an))
                      m (if (= an end) (-' n 1) n)]
                  (/ (*' m s) 2))))]
    (-' (+' (lin-sum n a) (lin-sum n b)) (lin-sum n (*' a b)))))

(fn [n a b]
  ;; this is a bad problem, it is just a math trick
  (let [sum1n (fn [n] (/ (*' n (inc n)) 2))
        zz (fn [i] (let [q (quot n i)

(fn f [n a b]
  (let [base-fn (fn [a b]
                  (filter #(or (zero? (mod % a)) (zero? (mod % b))) (range (*' a b))))
        base (base-fn a b)
        s (reduce + base)
        d (* a b (count base))
        x (quot n (*' a b))
        remaining-nums (filter #(or (zero? (mod % a)) (zero? (mod % b))) (range (*' x a b) n))
        ]
    
    (+' (+' (*' s x)
          (/ (*' d x (dec x)) 2))
       (reduce +' remaining-nums))
    
    ))

(fn big-divide [n a b]
  (letfn [(sum-progression [x y]
                           (let [z (/ y x)]
                             (quot (*' z (+ x y)) 2)))]
    (let [end-a (*' a (quot n a))
          end-b (*' b (quot n b))
          end-ab (*' (* a b) (quot n (* a b)))]
      (- (+ (sum-progression a (if (< end-a n) end-a (- end-a a)))
            (sum-progression b (if (< end-b n) end-b (- end-b b))))
         (sum-progression (* a b) (if (< end-ab n) end-ab (- end-ab (* a b))))))))

(fn bd [n i j]
  (let [n1  (dec n)
        in  (quot n1 i)
        jn  (quot n1 j)
        ijn (quot n1 (*' i j))
        imax  (*' i       in)
        jmax  (*' j       jn)
        ijmax (*' (*' i j) ijn)
        isum  (/ (*' in (+' i imax)) 2) 
        jsum  (/ (*' jn (+' j jmax)) 2)
        ijsum (/ (*' ijn (+' (*' i j) ijmax)) 2)]
        (-' (+' isum jsum) ijsum)))

(fn [n a b] (let [na (quot (dec n) a) ; count divisor < n
                  nb (quot (dec n) b) ; multiples of b < n
                  nlcm (quot (dec n) (* a b))
                  suma (fn [n] (/ (* n (+ n 1)) 2))]
            (- (+ (* a (suma na)) (* b (suma nb))) (* (* a b) (suma nlcm)))))
; based on a + 2a + 3a + ... + na = a * n * (n + 1) / 2

(fn bd [n a b]

    0
    (let [calcX (fn [n a b]
                  (loop [n1 (dec n)]
                    (if (and (zero? (mod n1 a)) (zero? (mod n1 b)))
                      n1
                      (recur (dec n1)))))
          calcA (fn [x n a b]
                  (let [a1 (- (reduce + (range x n a)) x)
                        b1 (- (reduce + (range x n b)) x)]
                    (+ a1 b1)))
          calcBCD (fn [x y] (/ (*' (/ x y) (+ x y)) 2))
          varX (calcX n a b)
          varA (calcA varX n a b)
          varB (calcBCD varX a)
          varC (calcBCD varX b)
          varD (calcBCD varX (* a b))]
      (- (+ varA varB varC) varD))))

; Trick is arithmetic sums
; Numbers less than n divisible by a is the sum (but (n-1) instead of n for strictly less than)
;    a + 2a + 3a + ... + (n/a)a = (n/a)*(a + (n/a)a)/2
(fn [n a b]
  (letfn [; t: number of terms
          ; d: difference between each consequetive term
          (arit-sum [t d] (quot (*' t (+ d (*' t d))) 2N)) 
          ; Sum of numbers (< n) divisible by d
          (sum-divis-by [d] (arit-sum (quot (dec n) d) d)) 
          ] 
    (-'
     (+'
      (sum-divis-by a) ; Sum of numbers divisible by a
      (sum-divis-by b) ; Sum of numbers divisible by b
      )
     (sum-divis-by (* a b)) ; Remove numbers divisible by both, since that will be counted twice in the sum    
     )
    ) 
  )

(fn sum-of-divisibles [n a b]
  (let [n (bigint n)
        a (bigint a)
        b (bigint b)
        sum-to-n #(/ (* % (inc %)) 2)]
    (+
      (* a (sum-to-n (quot (dec n) a)))
      (* b (sum-to-n (quot (dec n) b)))
      (* (* (- a) b) (sum-to-n (quot (dec n) (* a b)))))))

(fn [lim a b]
    (let [series-sum (fn [x]
                       (let [num-multiples (quot lim x)
                             overflow? (= lim (*' x num-multiples))
                             overflow (if overflow? lim 0)
                             num-pairs (quot num-multiples 2)
                             sum-of-pair (*' x (inc num-multiples))
                             avg-of-pair (quot sum-of-pair 2)
                             avg-factor (if (even? num-multiples) 0 1)]
                         (+' (*' num-pairs sum-of-pair)
                            (*' avg-factor avg-of-pair)
                            (*' -1 overflow))))]
      (+ (series-sum a) (series-sum b) (* -1 (series-sum (* a b))))))

(fn sum-coprimes [n a b]
	(let [da (bigint (quot (dec n) a)) db (bigint (quot (dec n) b)) dab (bigint (quot n (* a b)))]
	(-
		(+
			(/ (*  da (+ a (* a da))) 2)
			(/ (*  db (+ b (* b db))) 2))
		(/ (* dab (+ (* a b) (* a b dab))) 2))))

  (let [least-common-multipier (* a b) ;; a b are coprimes!
        [sum-a sum-b sum-lcm]

         [a b least-common-multipier])]
    (+ sum-a sum-b (- sum-lcm))
    )
  )

(fn curious-sum [lim a b]
  (let [c (* a b)
        lima (bigint (/ (dec lim) a))
        limb (bigint (/ (dec lim) b))
        limc (bigint (/ (dec lim) c))
        sa (* (inc lima) (/ lima 2))
        sb (* (inc limb) (/ limb 2))
        sc (* (inc limc) (/ limc 2))]
    (+ (* sa a) (* sb b) (- (* sc c)))))

(fn [n a b]
    (let [lcm (bigint (* a b))
          base
          (sort
           (into (take b (iterate #(+ a %) a))
                 (take (dec a) (iterate #(+ b %) b))))
          
          base-sum
          (reduce + base)
          
          base-multiple
          (quot n lcm)
          
          remainder
          (rem n lcm)

          result
          (+ (* (count base)
                (/ (* base-multiple (dec base-multiple))
                   2)
                lcm)
             (* base-multiple base-sum))
          
          
          left-over
          (reduce + (map #(+ (* base-multiple lcm) %)
                         (take-while #(< % remainder) base)))
          ]
      (+ result left-over)
      ))

;; The trick to calculating the answer very quickly is knowing a few
;; math facts.

;; 1. The sum of all numbers from 1 through n, inclusive, is
;;    n*(n+1)/2.  See Wikipeda article on Arithmetic Progression for
;;    one proof of this (in a more general form).

;; 2. The sum of all numbers that evenly divide a that are less than n
;;    is:
;;        a + 2*a + 3*a + ... + k*a
;;    where k is largest integer such that k*a < n, which is
;;    floor((n-1)/a), or (quot (dec n) a).  By factoring out a, we can
;;    see this is equal to:
;;        a * (1 + 2 + 3 + ... + k)
;;    By fact 1, this is equal to:
;;        a * k * (k+1) / 2

;; 3. Numbers less than n that are evenly divisible by at least one of
;;    a and b are:
;;        divisible by a: a + 2*a + 3*a + ... + k*a
;;        divisible by b: b + 2*b + 3*b + ... + l*b     where l=(quot (dec n) b)
;;    We can use fact 2 to easily calculate these two sums, but that
;;    would double-count all of these numbers:
;;        divisible by a*b: a*b + 2*a*b + 3*a*b + ... + m*a*b
;;    We know those are the only numbers double-counted, because we
;;    are told that a and b are coprime.  Fortunately it is easy to
;;    calculate that sum and subtract it out.

(fn [n a b]
  (let [sum-multiples-of (fn [divisor]
                           (let [x (quot (dec n) divisor)]
                             (/ (*' divisor x (inc x)) 2)))]
    (- (+ (sum-multiples-of a) (sum-multiples-of b))
       (sum-multiples-of (* a b)))))

(fn bd [n a b]
  (let [f #(/ (*' % (inc %)) 2)
        g #(*' % (f (quot n %)))
        as (g a)
        bs (g b)
        cs (+' (g (*' a b)) (if (some zero? [(mod n a) (mod n b)]) n 0))
        ]
    (+' as bs (-' cs))
    ))

(fn __ [n a b]
  (let [n (dec n)
        f (fn [x]
            (let [q (quot (* n) x)]
              (* (/ q 2) (inc q) x)))]
    (- (+ (f a) (f b)) (f (* a b)))))

(let [;; Rather than assuming that the inputs we're given are
        ;; coprime, let's verify it explicitly.  Here's a function
        ;; that computes the gcd of two numbers using the Euclidean
        ;; algorithm.
        gcd
        (fn [a b]
          {:pre [(every? integer? [a b]), (not (= a b 0))]
           :post [(= (rem a %) (rem b %) 0)]}
          ;; An explicit `loop` statement is necessary, because
          ;; otherwise the post-condition pulls the `recur` statements
          ;; out of tail position.
          (loop [a a, b b]
            (cond
              (> b a)    (recur b a)
              (neg? a)   (recur (- a) b)
              (neg? b)   (recur a (- b))
              (zero? b)  a
              :else      (recur b (rem a b)))))

        ;; This function returns the sum of all multiples of a
        ;; non-negative number `x` that do not exceed the non-negative
        ;; integer `n` in absolute value.  We use Gauss's formula to
        ;; compute the sum without adding up all the numbers, and we
        ;; allow for large inputs by using `*'` rather than `*`.
        sum-multiples-under-n
        (fn [n x]
          {:pre [(number? x), (integer? n),
                 (every? (complement neg?) [n x])]} 
          (let [q  (quot n x),
                m  (if (= 0 (rem n x)) (dec q) q)]
            (*' x m (inc m) 1/2)))]

    ;; Our main function.  We sum the multiples of `a` and multiples
    ;; of `b` separately, then account for the overcounting of their
    ;; common multiples by subtracting multiples of their lcm (that
    ;; is, their product, since we require that `a` and `b` are
    ;; coprime).
    (fn [n a b]
      {:pre [(every? integer? [n a b]),
             (every? (complement neg?) [n a b]),
             (= 1 (gcd a b))]}
      (+' (sum-multiples-under-n n a)
          (sum-multiples-under-n n b)
          (- (sum-multiples-under-n n (*' a b))))))

(fn f
  [a x y]
  (letfn [(ss [a b]
            (let [l (Math/floor (/ a b))
                  n (if (zero? (rem a b)) (dec l) l)]
              (bigint (* (bigdec (/ n 2)) (+ (bigdec (* 2 b)) (bigdec (* b (dec' n))))))))]
    (bigint (- (+ (ss a x) (ss a y)) (ss a (* x y))))))

(letfn [(sum-of-residue-class [n m]
          (if (< n m)
            0
           (let [size-of-residue-class (quot n m)
                 max-of-residue-class (- n (rem n m))
                 min-of-residue-class m]
             (quot (* size-of-residue-class
                      (+ min-of-residue-class
                         max-of-residue-class))
                   2))))]
  (fn [n a b]
    (let [n-1 (dec n)]
      (- (+ (sum-of-residue-class n-1 a)
            (sum-of-residue-class n-1 b))
         (sum-of-residue-class n-1 (* a b))))))

(fn big-divide [n a b]
  (let [[n a b] (map bigint [n a b])
        lcm (first (filter #(= 0 (rem % a) (rem % b)) (iterate inc 1)))
        div? #(or (zero? (rem % a)) (zero? (rem % b)))
        lcm-subset (filter div? (range 1 (inc lcm)))
        lcm-times (quot n lcm)
        lcm-subset-size (count lcm-subset)
        lcm-subset-sum (reduce + lcm-subset)
        final-subset (filter div? (range (inc (* lcm lcm-times)) n))
        final-subset-sum (reduce + final-subset)]
    (+ final-subset-sum 
       (* lcm-subset-sum lcm-times)
       (* lcm (* lcm-subset-size (/ lcm-times 2) (dec lcm-times))))))

(fn bdiv [ub a b]
  (let [count-for (fn [ub x]
                    (let [n (bigint (/ (dec ub) x))]
                      (* x (/ (* n (inc n)) 2))))]
    (- (+ (count-for ub a) (count-for ub b)) (count-for ub (* a b)))))

(fn [n a b]
    (letfn [(num-factors [n fac]
              (+ (long (/ n fac))
                 (if (zero? (rem n fac)) 0 1)))
            (sum-factors [n fac]
              (let [num-facs (num-factors n fac)]
                (* (/ (* num-facs (dec num-facs)) 2) ; (sum (range num-factors))
                   fac)))]
      (- (+ (sum-factors n a) (sum-factors n b))
         (sum-factors n (* a b)))))

              (* (+ 1 e) (/ e 2) %))]

(fn gg
  [T a b]
  (letfn
      [(sumrange [m] (/ (* m (inc m)) 2))
       (sumproducts [T a]
         (* a (sumrange (bigint (/ (dec (bigint T)) a)))))]
    (- (+ (sumproducts T a) (sumproducts T b))
       (sumproducts T (* a b)))))

(fn [n a b]
   (letfn [(sum-of   [x] (/ (*' x (inc x)) 2))
           (count-of [x] (quot (dec n) x))
           (total-of [x] (*' (sum-of (count-of x)) x))]
     (- (+ (total-of a) (total-of b)) (total-of (* a b)))))

(fn [a b c]
  (let [[a b c] (map bigint [a b c])
        bc (* b c)
        [bn cn bcn] (map #(quot a %) [b c bc])
        sum #(/ (* %2 (+ % (* %2 %))) 2)]
    (- (+ (sum b bn) 
          (sum c cn)) 
       (sum bc bcn)
       (apply + (for [x [b c] :when (zero? (mod a x))] a)))))

  (let [e #(quot (dec n) %)
        f #(let [r (e %)]
             (quot (*' r % (inc r)) 2))]
    (- (+ (f a) (f b)) (f (* a b)))))

(fn [n a b]
  (let [p  (* a b)
        p2 (biginteger (/ (dec n) p))
        la (biginteger (/ (dec n) a))
        lb (biginteger (/ (dec n) b))
        sa (* a (/ (* la (inc la)) 2))
        sb (* b (/ (* lb (inc lb)) 2))
        sp (* p (/ (* p2 (inc p2)) 2))]
    (- (+ sa sb) sp)))

(fn [n a b]
  (letfn [(sum [v]
                (let [x (dec n)
                      y (- x (mod x v))]

(fn [N a b]
  (letfn [
      (sum-mult [n x]
        (let [m (quot (dec n) x)] (*' x m (inc' m) 1/2)))]
    (-' (+' (sum-mult N a) (sum-mult N b)) (sum-mult N (*' a b)))))

(fn [n a b]
    (let [upper_limit (fn [x] (if (= 0 (rem n x)) (- (quot n x) 1) (quot n x)))
          sum_nums (fn [x] (quot (* x (+ x 1)) 2))
          sum_multiples (fn [x] (* x (sum_nums (upper_limit x))))]
        (- (+ (sum_multiples (bigint a)) (sum_multiples (bigint b))) (sum_multiples (bigint (* a b))))))

(fn [n a b]
   (letfn [(sum-range [x] (/ (*' x (inc x)) 2))
           (sum-of-multiples-below [factor ceil] (*' factor (sum-range (quot (dec ceil) factor))))]
     (+' (sum-of-multiples-below a n)
         (sum-of-multiples-below b n)
         (-' (sum-of-multiples-below (*' a b) n)))))

(fn [limit coprime-a coprime-b]
  (let [
    mult   (fn [coprime] (quot (- limit 1) coprime))
    mult-a (mult coprime-a)
    mult-b (mult coprime-b)
    procop (* coprime-a coprime-b)
    mult-both (mult procop)
    sumseries (fn [coprime m] (/ (*' coprime m (inc m)) 2))
  ](- 
    (+  (sumseries coprime-a mult-a) 
        (sumseries coprime-b mult-b))
    (sumseries procop mult-both)
)))

(let [sum-multiples (fn [x n]
                      (let [max-factor (if (zero? (mod n x))
                                         (dec (/ n x))
                                         (quot n x))
                            pair-sum (+ x (* x max-factor))
                            num-pairs (/ (dec max-factor) 2)]
                        (* (+ num-pairs 1/2) pair-sum)))]
  (fn [n a b]
    (- (+ (sum-multiples a n)
          (sum-multiples b n))
       (sum-multiples (* a b) n))))

(fn big-divide
  [n a b]
    (letfn [(find-divisible [n1 n2] (*' n1 (/ (*' n2 (inc n2)) 2)))]
      (-' (+' (find-divisible a (quot (dec n) a))
            (find-divisible b (quot (dec n) b)))
         (find-divisible (*' a b) (quot (dec n) (*' a b))))))

(fn big-div [n d1 d2]
  (let [sum
        (fn [d]
          (let [q (quot (dec n) d)]
            (*' q (inc q) (/ d 2))))]
    (-' (+' (sum d1) (sum d2))
       (sum (* d1 d2)))))

(fn [n a b]
  (letfn [(isosum [step end]
                  (let [upper (quot (dec end) step)]
                    (if (= 0 upper) 0
                    (*' step (quot (*' (inc upper) upper) 2)))))]
                  (-' (+' (isosum a n) (isosum b n)) (isosum (* a b) n))))

(fn bd [n a b] (let [ka (bigint (Math/floor (/ (- n 1) a))), kb (bigint (Math/floor (/ (- n 1) b))),
                            c (* a b), kc (bigint (Math/floor (/ (- n 1) c)))]
                            (+ (* (+ (* ka a) a) (/ ka 2)) (* (+ (* kb b) b) (/ kb 2)) (- (* (+ (* kc c) c) (/ kc 2))))))

(letfn [(multiple-sum [n x]
          (let [greatest-multiple (bigint (Math/floor (/ n x)))]
            (if (zero? greatest-multiple)
              0
              (*' x
                 (/ (*' (inc greatest-multiple)
                       greatest-multiple)
                    2N)))))]
  (fn [n a b]
    (let [n (dec n)]
       (-' (+' (multiple-sum n a)
             (multiple-sum n b))
          (multiple-sum n (* a b))))))

(fn __ [n a b]
  (let
      [nn (BigInteger. (str n))
       aa (BigInteger. (str a))
       bb (BigInteger. (str b))
       bigAdd #(.add % %2)
       bigMult #(.multiply % %2)
       bigMinus #(.subtract % %2)
       bigDiv #(.divide % %2)
       s (fn [x] (#(bigDiv (bigMult (bigAdd % BigInteger/ONE) %) (BigInteger. "2")) (bigDiv (bigMinus nn BigInteger/ONE) x)))]
    (bigMinus
      (bigAdd
        (bigMult aa (s aa))
        (bigMult bb (s bb)))
      (bigMult (bigMult aa bb) (s (bigMult aa bb))))))

(fn the-big-divide [n a b]
  (let [quoter (fn [x]
                 (let [q (quot n x)]
                   (if (= 0 (rem n x))
                     (dec q)
                     q)))
        aq     (quoter a)
        bq     (quoter b)
        abq    (quoter (* a b))
        summer (fn [q x]
                 (quot (reduce *' [q (+ q 1) x]) 2))]
    (- (+ (summer aq a) (summer bq b)) (summer abq (* a b)))))

(fn [n f s] 
  (letfn [(sum [c] 
            (let [steps (quot (dec n) c)
                  high  (* steps c)]
              (* 1/2 steps (+ c high))))]
    (- (- (sum (* f s)) (sum f) (sum s)))))

(fn the-big-divide [m a b]
  (letfn [(sums [x]
            (let [i (dec (bigint (Math/ceil (/ m x))))]
              (*' x 1/2 i (inc i))))]
    (-' (+' (sums a) (sums b))
        (sums (* a b)))))

(fn [n a b]                                                                                                                                             
      (let [ab       (* a b)                                                                                                      
            j        (quot n ab)                                                                                                                          
            ab-range (set (concat (range 0 ab a) (range 0 ab b)))                                                                 
            x        (apply + ab-range)                                                                                                                   
            y        (* ab (count ab-range))                                                                                      
            n1       (* j ab)                                                                                                                             
            n1-range (set (concat (range n1 n a) (range n1 n b)))                                                                 
            total    (+' (*' j x)                 ; number times we add the multiples from 0 .. ab
                         (/ (*' y (- j 1) j) 2)   ; number of times we add the constant ab. (/ (* (- j 1) j) 2) is the triangular number for j-1
                         (reduce +' n1-range))]   ; sum of numbers above the last multiple of ab
        total))

  (let [e #(quot (- n 1N) %)
        f #(* % (/ (* (e %) (inc (e %))) 2))
        x (f a)
        y (f b)

       (- (+ x y) z)))

  (let [q (fn [x] (quot (dec n) x))
        f (fn [x] (*' x 
                     (/ (*' (q x)
                        (inc (q x)))
                        2)))
        x (f a)
        y (f b)
        z (f (* a b))]
            (-' (+' x y) z)))

  (let [m  (dec n)
        ab (*' a b)
        A  (quot m a)

        AB (quot m ab)]

   (let [ab (*' a b)

     (println (sum na a) (sum nb b) (sum nab ab))

     ))

(fn divisibles-sum [n a b]
  (letfn [(sum [x]
            (let [k (quot (dec n) x)]
              (/ (*' k (+ x (* x k))) 2)))]
    (- (+ (sum a) (sum b)) (sum (* a b)))))

(fn big-divide [n a b]
  (let [sum-of-multi (fn [x t]
                       (let [cnt (/ (- (dec x) (rem (dec x) t)) t )]
                         (/ (*' (+' t (*' t cnt)) cnt) 2)) )]
    (-' (+' (sum-of-multi n a)
          (sum-of-multi n b))
       (sum-of-multi n (* a b)))))

(fn [n a b]
   (let [q #(quot (dec n) %)
         sum-ap (fn [a1 m d] (*' m (/ (+ (* 2 a1) (* d (dec m))) 2)))
         sd #(sum-ap % (q %) %)]
      (- (+ (sd a) (sd b)) (sd (* a b)))))

(fn [li a b]
  (letfn [(sm [v] (*' v (let [n (quot (- li 1) v)] (/ (*' (inc n) n) 2))))]
    (- (+ (sm a) (sm b)) (sm (* a b)))))

(fn [n a b]
  (let [ab (* a b)
        aq (bigint (Math/ceil (/ n a)))
        bq (bigint (Math/ceil (/ n b)))
        abq (bigint (Math/ceil (/ n (* ab))))
        saq (if (> aq 0) (/ (* aq (dec aq)) 2) 0)
        sbq (if (> bq 0) (/ (* bq (dec bq)) 2) 0)
        sabq (if (> abq 0) (/ (* abq (dec abq)) 2) 0)]
    (- (+ (* a saq) (* b sbq)) (* ab sabq))
  ))

(fn bd [n a b]
  (letfn [(sn [n] (/ (*' n (+ n 1)) 2))
          (ds [n a] (*' a (sn (quot (dec n) a))))]
    (- (+ (ds n a) (ds n b)) (ds n (*' a b)))))

(fn bd
  [n a b]
  (letfn [(calc [n x]
            (let [n-by-a (quot (dec n) x)]
              (-> n-by-a
                  (*' n-by-a)
                  (+' n-by-a)
                  (/ 2)
                  (*' x))))]
    (- (+' (calc n a) (calc n b)) (calc n (* a b)))))

(fn [n a b]
  (let [foo (fn [x] (/ (* x (inc x)) 2))
        p (quot (dec n) a)
        q (quot (dec n) b)
        r (quot (dec n) (* a b))]
    (+
     (* a (foo p))
     (* b (foo q))
      (- (* a b (foo r))))))

#(let [max-mult (fn [x] (quot (-' %1 1) x))
sum (fn [x] (*' x (/ (*' (max-mult x) (+' (max-mult x) 1)) 2)))]
(-' (+' (sum %2) (sum %3)) (sum (*' %2 %3))))

(fn [n a b]
  (letfn [(find-sum [m x]
            (let [q (quot (dec m) x)
                  p (inc q)]
              (/ (*' x q p) 2)))]
    (- (+' (find-sum n a) (find-sum n b)) (find-sum n (* a b)))))

(fn [n a b]
  (let [big-n (bigint n)
        progression-sum (fn [x] (/ (* x (inc x)) 2))
        nat-nums-sum (fn [x] (* x (progression-sum (quot (dec big-n) x))))]
    (- (+ (nat-nums-sum a) (nat-nums-sum b)) (nat-nums-sum (* a b)))))

(fn big-divide-coprimes
  ([n coprime1 coprime2]
     (- (+ (big-divide-coprimes n coprime1)
           (big-divide-coprimes n coprime2))
        (big-divide-coprimes n (* coprime1 coprime2))))
  ([n divisor]
     (let [arithmetic-sum (fn [first-term term-difference n-terms]
                            (/ (*' n-terms (+' (*' 2 first-term) (*' (dec n-terms) term-difference))) 2))
           n-terms (quot (dec n) divisor)]
       (arithmetic-sum divisor divisor n-terms))))

; We Project Euler now boys!
(fn [n a b]
  (letfn [(arith-series [a limit]
            (let [a1 a
                  limit (dec limit)
                  an (- limit (rem limit a))
                  n (quot an a)]
              (/ (*' n (+ a1 an)) 2)))]
    (- (+ (arith-series a n) (arith-series b n)) 
      (arith-series (*' a b) n))))

(fn sum-div [n a b]
  (let [
    sum-a (fn [n d] (/ (* (inc n) n d) 2)),
    sum-upto (fn [n d] (sum-a (quot n d) d)),
    limit (dec n)]
      (+ (sum-upto limit a)
         (sum-upto limit b)
         (- (sum-upto limit (* a b))))))

(fn [n a b]
  (letfn [(div-sum [x]
            (let [y (quot (dec n) x)
                  z (/ (*' y (inc y)) 2)]

    (+' (div-sum a) (div-sum b) (- (div-sum (*' a b))))))

(fn [n a b]

  (-' (+' (sum (dec n) a) (sum (dec n) b)) (sum (dec n) (*' a b)))))

        modpsum (fn [n x] (* x (powersum (quot (dec n) x))))]

(fn [n a b]

    (-

(fn [n a b]

              (/ (*' m (inc m) d) 2)))]
    (- (+ (sum a)

(fn [n a b]
  (let
    [highest-mult (fn [lim base]
                    (if (= 0 (mod (dec lim) base))
                      (dec lim)
                      (recur (dec lim) base)))
     steps (fn [high base]
             (/ high base))
     pairs (fn [high base]
             (biginteger (/ (steps high base) 2)))
     middle (fn [high base]
              (-> (steps high base)
                  (/ 2)
                  biginteger
                  (+ 1)
                  (* base)))
     sum-pairs (fn [high base]
                 (* (pairs high base) (+ high base)))
     sum-all (fn [high base]
                (if (even? (steps high base))
                  (sum-pairs high base)
                  (+ (sum-pairs high base) (middle high base))))]

    (-
     (+ (sum-all (highest-mult n a) a)
        (sum-all (highest-mult n b) b))
     (sum-all (highest-mult n (* a b)) (* a b)))))

         (* bb (tri (quot (f bb) bb)))

    (+ (sum-divisible-under n a)

  (letfn [(sum-range [start end]

                       (/ (*' cnt (inc' cnt) start) 2)))]
     (-' (+' (sum-range a n) (sum-range b n))

(fn
  [j k l]
  (letfn [(sum [a n]
            (/ (* n (+ a (* n a))) 2))
          (tit [x y]
            (sum x (bigint (quot (dec y) x))))]
    (- (+ (tit k j)
          (tit l j))
       (tit (* k l) j))))

(fn [n a b]
   (letfn [(f [k x] (/ (* k x (inc x)) 2))
           (g [n x] (f x (bigint (/ (dec n) x))))]
     (let [c (* a b)
           sa (g n a)
           sb (g n b)
           sc (g n c)]
       (- (+ sa sb) sc))))

(let [sum (fn [n & args]

                              (/ (*' cnt (+' % end)) 2))

  (fn [n a b]
